name: Unicorn Media
tag_list: ovp, internet-video, streaming-video, internet-video-solutions, mobile, video, online-video, streaming, live-streaming, monetize, analytics, syndication, syndicate, iphone, cdn, platform, cloud, real-time, reporting, transcoding, player, custom-player, ap
overview:
Unicorn Media, Inc. is the leading provider of Internet video solutions that enable companies to maximize IP video profitability. Our patented technology, Unicorn Onceâ„¢, allows customers to ingest video content one time and deliver it to every Internet-connected device via a single URL. Content owners can monetize their content on any device by dynamically inserting targeted ads and analyzing content and ad performance in real-time on every platform, allowing for on-the-fly changes to maximize profitability.

Background Unicorn Media was founded by digital content distribution infrastructure experts and has revolutionized media distribution by creating a comprehensive solution with unprecedented ease-of-use. Headquartered in Tempe, AZ, Unicorn Media Inc. has offices in Los Angeles, San Francisco, New York, Chicago and London. Unicorn Media is a privately held, self-funded company.
